gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all custom properties associated with a specific issue type in Jira so that I can understand the additional metadata available for that issue type.
gold.ideal: The API should return a list of property keys for the specified issue type, allowing me to see all custom attributes defined.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to fetch the value of a specific property for an issue type to ensure that my application can correctly interpret the data associated with that issue type.
gold.ideal: The API should return the value of the specified property key for the given issue type, enabling me to access the necessary information.

gold.user: As a system administrator, I want to set a custom property for an issue type to enhance the issue tracking capabilities in our Jira instance.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully update the specified property key with the new value for the issue type, confirming the change was made.

gold.user: As a product owner, I need to remove an outdated property from an issue type to keep our issue types clean and relevant.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully delete the specified property key from the issue type, ensuring that it no longer appears in the property list.
